author: 空空狐王
description:
Ling An married into the Xing family, became the second wife of Young Master Xing, he thought from then on to live a good life, but did not think, that he would spend his days like years. His heart and soul hollow to the end.

“Xing Shao, you gave me marriage but you tied me up, you are not willing to consider other people’s feelings, you are to the end ignoring me.”

That night, Xing Gexuan handed him a divorce agreement and said, “You’ve wanted to escape every day, now, I’m not stopping you, sign and go.”

He stamped, this moment, but Ling An did not have a trace of reluctance, no words, but nodded, agreed to him, but the tears have been uncontrollable.

Because he knows that the man he loves the most, is Xing Gexuan, even if the wound is full of holes, he will still be heartbroken.

Pulling the suitcase, the sky still dark, Ling An left.

But no one expected, an hour later, Xing Gexuan tore up the divorce certificate and feverishly started looking for him all over the world.>
